#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int carry(int* a, int* b){
    int ta  = 0;
    int tb  = 0;
    int ctr = 0;
    int cy = 0;
    while ((*a > 0) || (*b> 0)){
        ta = *a % 10;
        *a = *a/10;
        tb = *b % 10;
        *b = *b/10;
        if (ta+tb >= 10){cy++;}
        if (ta+tb+cy>=10){
            ctr++;
        }
    }
return ctr;
}
int main (){
int a =-1;
int b =-1;
int op[100000];
int i = 0;
while (1){
    cin>>a>>b;
    if (a ==0 && b == 0){break;}
    int ctr = carry(&a,&b);
    op[i] = ctr;
    i++;
}
for (int j = 0;j<i;j++){
        if (op[j] == 0){
        cout<< "No carry operation."<<endl;
    }else if (op[j] == 1){
    cout <<op[j]<<" carry operation."<<endl;
    }
    else{
    cout <<op[j]<<" carry operations."<<endl;
    }
}
return 0;
}
